entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
